spark-service
=============

spark-service will solve your problem of where to start with documentation,
by providing a basic explanation of how to do it easily.

Look how easy it is to use:

    import project
    # Get your stuff done
    project.do_stuff()

Features
--------

- Be awesome
- Make things faster

Installation
------------

Install spark-service by running:

    install project

Contribute
----------

- Issue Tracker: github.com/spark-service/spark-service/issues
- Source Code: github.com/spark-service/spark-service

Support
-------

If you are having issues, please let us know.
Contact: lukas.heumos@posteo.net
